data.actual_result: A popup window appears that says "You need to be friends with <your own username> to start a call"
data.expected_result: A popup window should that you need to be friends with <the other users username> in order to call him/her
data.short_description: Different name showing when calling a user that is not in your friend list if you have DMs disabled in Privacy settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Have DMs disabled in User Settings > Privacy & Safety - Find someone that is not in your friendlist - Rightclick and click on "call"
